name: 1,4-butanediol formal
SMLTrestrictions: G30 Group Restriction No. 30 corresponds to FCM substance No. 254,344,672. Group restriction specification is expressed as 1,4-butanediol.
NotesCompliance: V21 In case of reaction with foods or simulants verification of compliance shall include verification that the migration limits of the hydrolysis products, formaldehyde and 1,4-butanediol, are not exceeded.
